body: Dude i like some shotacon or lolicon but this made me a little uncomfortable
shotacons be like: i love children

Alright usually I don’t really reply to this shit cause this is a a doujin site like wtf are people white knighting this shit but branding people as pedo to shota and loli are retarded cause here’s the thing guys it may blow your weak mindset  mind but get this, these are CHARACTERS and they are not real, these aren’t real minors, their fucking pictures,  no one is getting hurt because of shota or loli doujins so chill out. How about you actually put you rage on actual child porn like cuties that uses real children as actors  cause if you think anime boys or girls with no actual noses or realistic features pisses you off then get off the Internet. Most hentai is 80% literally high school characters and style differences in art can make them look younger then what they actually are so just put that in perspective and get off your soap box.
Jesus fucking christ sexualizing an image that clearly depicts a figure of a minor is a blatant pedophelia, disgusting people.
